Module entities
Package controls

Class Email

  • java.lang.Object
    • controls.Email
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Notification
    public class Email
extends java.lang.Object
implements Notification
    Class email is a specific implementation of the notification interface, which has been adapted to send emails notifications to the students. Class Attributes: - properties : Properties, a hashmap of properties to initialize the host and port - session : Session, which is used to authenticate and hold an instance of the sender email and password, which is the system email and password in this case. - message : Message, which is the actual email to be sent, and inlcudes the email body and subject, and other email attributes. - senderEmail : String, which is the system email from which the email will be sent. - senderPassword : String, which is the password to the system email from which the email will be sent.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Email()
      Class constructor which initializes the properties and email session.

      boolean sendDropCourseMessage​(java.lang.String studID, java.lang.String courseID, java.lang.String courseName)
      sendDropCourseMessage() is used to send a notification to a student when the student drops a course that he/she is registered to.
      boolean sendEnrolledCourseListMessage​(java.lang.String studID, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> courseList)
      Send an email to a student containing all the courses he/she is registered to.
      boolean sendRegisterSuccessfulMessage​(java.lang.String studID, java.lang.String courseID, java.lang.String courseName)
      Sends an email to the student containing the course that he/she is successfully registered to.
      boolean sendWaitListedMessage​(java.lang.String studID, java.lang.String courseID, java.lang.String courseName)
      Sends an email to the student containing the course that he/she is waitlisted to.

      • sendRegisterSuccessfulMessage

        public boolean sendRegisterSuccessfulMessage​(java.lang.String studID,
                                             java.lang.String courseID,
                                             java.lang.String courseName)
        Sends an email to the student containing the course that he/she is successfully registered to.
        Specified by:
        sendRegisterSuccessfulMessage in interface Notification
        Parameters:
        studID - : String, the ID of the user to whom the email needs to be sent.
        courseID - : String, the ID of the course the student has been registered to.
        courseName - : String, the name of the course the student has been registered to
        Returns:
        true, if the email is sent successfully, false, if the email failed to send

      • sendEnrolledCourseListMessage

        public boolean sendEnrolledCourseListMessage​(java.lang.String studID,
                                             java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> courseList)
        Send an email to a student containing all the courses he/she is registered to.
        Specified by:
        sendEnrolledCourseListMessage in interface Notification
        Parameters:
        studID - : String, the ID of the user to whom the message needs to be sent.
        courseList - : HashMap (String, String), a list of courseID's as a key, and the courseName as a value, to which the student is registered.
        Returns:
        true, if the email is sent successfully. false, if the email failed to send.

      • createMessage

        public static javax.mail.Message createMessage​(java.lang.String recipient,
                                               java.lang.String subject,
                                               java.lang.String body)
        createMessage is a function that is used to initialize the message object and populate the body, subject, sender, receiver etc.
        Parameters:
        recipient - : String, the address to which the email is being sent.
        subject - : String, the subject field for the email.
        body - : String, the body of the email.
        Returns:
        : Message, a Message object containing the initialized email which can be sent.
